column3: Latest;Kandal: A Chinese man was arrested at 01:05 AM on 13th July 2019 on National Highway 21B in front of Yong Yen Casino located in Chrey Thom Village
column11: who was spotted acting suspiciously by cops.------ Following questiong the suspect confessed to the fact that he had actually bought drugs from an unidentified person to sell and distribute to other Chinese at the Yong Yuan Casino.------https://postnews.com.kh/local/461752
